name: 2048 Arcade The Puzzle Game
description:
Easy to play, fun to master!

HINT: Move your blocks by bumping and squeezing into the falling blocks for the highest score!

Features:
• One tap controls
• Go beyond 2048
• Original physics based puzzle gameplay
• Low low battery consumption
• Low low file size
• NO ADS
• no wifi needed

WARNING! Extremely addictive.
